title: And I thought Morgana was my freelo....
body:
Holy cow this guy is a _beast_ if your team has half a brain.  Tons of stuns, negates all projectiles (RIP Ez ults completely gone and Corko missiles), gets so tanky, and still has great teamfight CC/peel.  This guy is enough cc for Yi cause guess what -- targeted stuns can't be dodged and not even Soraka heal is gonna save you from the stun and burst.

Bless the creators of Braum

http://orig15.deviantart.net/b721/f/2014/108/9/c/braum_by_sollyz-d7exo6n.jpg
